channel.title: CVE Feed for Flexera Software LLC -- LibRaw
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Flexera Software LLC -- LibRaw

item.title: CVE-2018-5819|2024-08-05T05:47:55.378Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- libraw
item.description: An error within the "parse_sinar_ia()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) within LibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 can be exploited to exhaust available CPU resources.

item.title: CVE-2018-5817|2024-08-05T05:47:55.867Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- libraw
item.description: A type confusion error within the "unpacked_load_raw()" function within LibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) can be exploited to trigger an infinite loop.
